mainContact.address: Near East Boulevard, 99138 Nicosia / TRNC, Mersin 10 – TURKEY

applicationProcess.title: How to Apply
applicationProcess.description: Students can apply online at https://aday.neu.edu.tr. The application system is available for all prospective students year-round.

internationalExams.title: Accepted International Certificates
internationalExams.description: NEU accepts: GCSE, IGCSE, International Baccalaureate, ACT, SAT, and various international high school diplomas.

regionalExams.title: Accepted Regional Certificates
regionalExams.description: NEU accepts: Tawjihi (Jordan/Palestine), Baccalaureate (Lebanon/Iraq/Syria), Diploma Debirestan (Iran), Higher Secondary Certificate (Pakistan/India/Bangladesh), WAEC/NECO (Nigeria), GAOKAO (China).

documentTranslation.title: Document Translation Requirements
documentTranslation.description: All documents in languages other than English or Turkish must have an official translation.

residencePermit.title: Student Residence Permit
residencePermit.description: International students must register for residence permit at https://permissions.gov.ct.tr/login. The International Students Office assists with this process.

fees.title: Tuition Fees 2025-2026
fees.description: Full list of programs and tuition fees available at https://aday.neu.edu.tr. Fees vary by program and faculty.
fees.note: Fees range from $3,500 to $10,000 per year depending on program

freezing.title: Freezing Registration
freezing.description: Students can freeze their registration under certain circumstances.

internationalStudentsOffice.title: International Students Office
internationalStudentsOffice.description: Handles all matters regarding international students including registration, accounting, graduation and student permits.
internationalStudentsOffice.workingHours: Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM (closed during holidays)

grandLibrary.title: Grand Library
grandLibrary.description: Near East University Grand Library provides study spaces, resources, and academic materials for students.
grandLibrary.workingHours: Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM (24/7 during exam periods)

studentDeanshipOffice.title: Student Deanship Office
studentDeanshipOffice.description: The Dean of Students Office provides services, programs, and various opportunities to students.

postOffice.title: Post Office
postOffice.description: NEU Post Office branch provides postal and mailing services to students and staff.
postOffice.location: Faculty of Administrative and Economics Sciences, Ground Floor

dormitories.title: Student Dormitories
dormitories.description: NEU has 12 dormitories on campus (Dormitory 1-12) plus a Guest House. All dormitories are located within the campus area.

laundryShop.title: Laundry Shop
laundryShop.description: Campus laundry facility available for students.

pizzaPizza.title: Pizza Pizza Restaurant
pizzaPizza.description: On-campus restaurant serving pizza and Italian cuisine.

gusto.title: Gusto Restaurant & Cafe
gusto.description: Campus restaurant and cafe offering meals and beverages.

patisserie.title: Patisserie and Bakery Cafe
patisserie.description: Campus cafe offering pastries, baked goods, and coffee.

ncsKebap.title: NCS Kebap House
ncsKebap.description: Campus restaurant specializing in kebabs and Turkish cuisine.

chickenHouse.title: Chicken House
chickenHouse.description: Campus eatery serving chicken dishes and fast food.

theKaffo.title: The Kaffo
theKaffo.description: Campus coffee shop and cafe for students to relax and study.

olympicPool.title: Near East Olympic Swimming Pool
olympicPool.description: Full Olympic-size swimming pool facility available for students and staff for recreation and sports activities.

basketballStadium.title: Near East Basketball Indoor Stadium
basketballStadium.description: Indoor basketball stadium for sports events, training, and recreational activities.

sportsComplex.title: Near East Sports Complex
sportsComplex.description: Comprehensive sports complex with various facilities for different sports and physical activities.

carMuseum.title: Cyprus Car Museum
carMuseum.description: On-campus museum showcasing the history of automobiles in Cyprus. Open to students and visitors.

modernArtMuseum.title: Cyprus Modern Art Museum
modernArtMuseum.description: Modern art museum on campus featuring contemporary artworks and exhibitions.

eventPark.title: NEU Event Park
eventPark.description: Large outdoor event space used for university events, festivals, and gatherings.

ataturkCenter.title: Ataturk Culture and Congress Center
ataturkCenter.description: Major venue for cultural events, conferences, ceremonies, and university gatherings. Houses the Student Deanship Office.

hospitalBranch.title: Near East Bank - Hospital Branch
hospitalBranch.description: Banking services near the hospital for convenient access to financial services.

universityBranch.title: Near East Bank - University Branch
universityBranch.description: Main university banking branch providing full banking services to students and staff.

ikasSupermarket.title: Ikas Supermarket
ikasSupermarket.description: On-campus supermarket providing groceries and daily necessities for students.

neuHospital.title: Near East University Hospital
neuHospital.description: Full-service hospital facility on campus providing medical care to students and the community.

faculties.name: Faculty of Artificial Intelligence and Informatics
faculties.description: Leading faculty offering cutting-edge programs in AI, Computer Engineering, Cyber Security, and Data Analytics.

faculties.name: Faculty of Engineering
faculties.description: Comprehensive engineering programs with modern laboratories and hands-on learning opportunities.

faculties.name: Faculty of Medicine
faculties.description: Medical education and training programs for aspiring doctors with teaching hospital facilities.

faculties.name: Faculty of Dentistry
faculties.description: Comprehensive dental education with modern clinics and experienced faculty.

faculties.name: Faculty of Pharmacy
faculties.description: Comprehensive pharmacy education with specializations in pharmaceutical sciences and technology.

faculties.name: Faculty of Law
faculties.description: Prepares students for legal careers with emphasis on international law and human rights.

faculties.name: Faculty of Economics and Administrative Sciences
faculties.description: Business, economics, and administrative programs preparing students for the corporate world.

faculties.name: Faculty of Architecture
faculties.description: Architecture and Interior Architecture programs with focus on sustainable design.

faculties.name: Faculty of Communication
faculties.description: Media, journalism, and communication programs with modern studios and equipment.

faculties.name: Atatürk Faculty of Education
faculties.description: Comprehensive teacher training and education programs.

faculties.name: Faculty of Arts and Sciences
faculties.description: Liberal arts and sciences programs covering humanities and natural sciences.

faculties.name: Faculty of Health Sciences
faculties.description: Allied health programs supporting the healthcare system.

faculties.name: Faculty of Nursing
faculties.description: Professional nursing education and training programs.

faculties.name: Faculty of Fine Arts and Design
faculties.description: Creative arts and design programs.

faculties.name: Faculty of Civil and Environmental Engineering
faculties.description: Civil engineering and environmental programs with focus on sustainability.

faculties.name: Faculty of Sports Sciences
faculties.description: Sports education, management, and coaching programs.

faculties.name: Faculty of Tourism
faculties.description: Tourism and hospitality management programs.

faculties.name: Faculty of Veterinary Medicine
faculties.description: Veterinary medicine programs with comprehensive animal care training.

faculties.name: Faculty of Theology
faculties.description: Islamic theology and religious studies programs.

faculties.name: Faculty of Agriculture
faculties.description: Agriculture and food engineering programs.

psychologicalCounseling.title: Psychological Counseling Services
psychologicalCounseling.description: NEU provides psychological counseling services through the Psychological Counseling, Guidance, and Research Center.

careerPlanning.title: Career Planning Services
careerPlanning.description: The Career Planning Unit provides career counseling, job preparation, and professional development support.

studentActivities.title: Student Activities Center
studentActivities.description: Helps organize events, directs students to clubs and societies, and represents students in domestic and international events.

disabilitySupport.title: Disability Support Services
disabilitySupport.description: The Disabled Students Unit provides accommodations and support services for students with disabilities.

petitionsSystem.title: Student Petitions System
petitionsSystem.description: Students can submit petitions regarding refunds, academic matters, job applications, dormitory matters, and financial matters through the online petition system.

alumniServices.title: Alumni Services
alumniServices.description: NEU Alumni Unit maintains connections with graduates and provides networking opportunities and continued support after graduation.

academicCalendar.title: Academic Calendar 2025-2026
academicCalendar.description: Full academic calendar with important dates for registration, exams, and holidays.

universityHandbook.title: University Handbook
universityHandbook.description: Comprehensive guide to NEU policies, procedures, and academic regulations.
